forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 56. West wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours of the night, Boston rests beneath a canopy of soft clouds, temperatures weaving a chilly thread into the cool evening air. There’s a whisper of rain potentially teasing the horizon, but for now, it remains merely a chance, as shadows of the skyline are highlighted by flickering city lights. A steady west wind dances around 14 mph, occasionally gusting as if playfully challenging the late-night stillness. As dawn breaks today, the city will shake off its shrouded slumber, welcoming a partly sunny embrace, with the promise of a mild high near 56. The wind will continue its leisurely jaunt, nudging the trees and ruffling the leaves.

While the day offers a hint of warmth, the cool breeze suggests dressing in layers—perhaps a light sweater beneath a windbreaker. It’s a fine morning for a stroll along the waterfront or a quiet brunch at a tucked-away café, allowing the gentle sun and brisk air to energize your spirit. As the clouds slowly part and Boston awakens, one might savor a moment on a park bench, soaking in the transitory dance of early spring, preparing to embrace the vibrancy that the day promises.
